EmailTemplate.name: End of Month Incentive - Day 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't miss out on our [Month] offer!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to quickly follow up about our end-of-month offer to discount all website setup fees. This offer is only available for a limited time and is expiring soon.
I don't want you to miss out on this chance to elevate your online presence and stand out from the competition.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
Best, {!User.Name}
